pullRequest.title: Feature/programming exercises management/update selected exercises
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de and https://artemistest2.ase.in.tum.de.
 Client: I followed the coding and design guidelines, except for one point because I had to create a new component.
 Client: I added multiple integration tests (Jest) related to the features (with a high test coverage)
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context


This PR has been created because of a suggestion from an instructor using ArTEMiS in his/her seminar, stating
that having an exercise sheet each week with multiple exercises, required quite some time to manage/update.
Examples reported:

If the deadline changes, the deadline must be changed for all three exercises rather than once.
Currently, if we want to download the repository and results, we have to do so for each exercise.

Therefore, the possibility to update or download repositories of multiple exercises together could save some time in this context.
Description

An additional checkbox has been added in the programming exercises list. Additional checks ensure that this will be hidden for users without instructor permissions within the course.
As soon as at least one programming-exercise has been selected, two additional buttons will appear at the bottom of the list, which if pressed will open their respective modal component ("Edit selected" and "Download Repositories").
The "Edit selected" modal corresponds to a new modal component, which will allow to edit the timeline of the exercises.
For the "Download Repositories" modal, the currently existing one has been adapted and reused. (programming-assessment-repo-export-dialog.component.ts)
Steps for Testing


Log in to Artemis
Navigate to Course Administration
Choose a Course where the user has instructor permissions
Select multiple programming exercises using the checkbox
Click the "Edit Selected" button and set a new Release or Due date
Save
Check if the selected exercises have now been updated with the new dates
Select programming exercises that have at least one participation
Click the "Download repositories" and export them
Choose a different Course where the user does not have instructor permissions
No checkboxes should be displayed

Test Coverage



programming-exercise-edit-selected.component.ts: 69,64%
programming-exercise.component.ts: 70,37%
programming-assessment-repo-export-dialog.component.ts: 28.07%
Screenshots

Added page reload after exercises update
